Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the statute of limitations for certain sexual harassment complaints
Summary: Extends the statute of limitations for complaints alleging cases of sexual harassment in employment, to 3 years or within 1 year of the complainant's employment termination at such employer, whichever is later.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to extending the statute of limitations for certain sexual harassment complaints
